title: Watch Face X-Ray
summary: X-Ray Watch Face for Android Wear clock
description: Fun your friends with transparent X-Ray Watch Watch Face. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.FEATURES:- 12/24 auto-format- ambient (dimmed) mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose X-Ray Watch Face4. Enjoy!The anatomy watch face has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Fun your friends with transparent X-Ray Watch Watch Face. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- 12/24 auto-format
- ambient (dimmed) mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose X-Ray Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The anatomy watch face has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
